hero.title: Women on Boards Ukraine
text: Women on Boards Ukraine is established to be a leading not-for-profit organization dedicated to empowering women in leadership roles and advancing the presence of women in corporate boardrooms . We aim to create a vibrant community where women uplift and support one another, foster inclusive decision-making, and advocate for legislative changes that ensure equal opportunities. We firmly believe in the power of collaboration and partnerships to build a more inclusive and equitable future for all. Together with our strategic partners we plan to offer development and educational opportunities for all our members. The goal of these initiatives is to support our members in their pursuit of thriving and attaining greater success in their professional careers.

text.t1: Our commitment lies in nurturing a vibrant community where women elevate one another, building the way for enhanced diversity within corporate boardrooms. We are dedicated to unleashing the exceptional talents of professional women in Ukraine and onto the global stage.
text.t2: Women on Boards Ukraine offers its members:
t2_ol: Supportive Community: Members uplift and empower each other, creating a strong network.
Career Advancement: Peer mentorship and support help members navigate corporate challenges.
Diversity Advocacy: The organization promotes diversity in corporate boardrooms.
Global Exposure: Members gain visibility and opportunities beyond national borders.
Professional Development: Access to training and educational programs fosters growth.
Advocacy: The organization champions legislative changes for equal opportunities, benefiting women in various sectors.
text.t3: Our mission statement underscores the organization's dedication to fostering a supportive community, promoting diversity, and advancing the professional development and global recognition of its members. These benefits collectively empower women to excel in their careers and contribute to positive change within the corporate world and society at large.
text.t4: We believe that through such strategic focus Women on Boards Ukraine together with its members will play a pivotal role in transforming the corporate landscape and creating a more equitable and prosperous future.

founders.title: Founders of WOB Ukraine
text: Founded by accomplished business leaders Olena Malynska, Tatiana Furtseva, and Nina Dombrowska, Women on Boards Ukraine was established in response to the challenging circumstances caused by the aggressive invasion of Ukraine in 2022.

The founders personally experienced the challenges faced by professional women who were displaced and whose lives and careers were significantly affected. Inspired by the influential professional women communities they encountered outside of Ukraine, they recognized the importance of a strong and supportive network to uplift and empower women.

With a firm belief in the critical role of good corporate governance in rebuilding Ukraine and driving its future economic progress, Women on Boards Ukraine was created as a pillar for a better future, where professional women will play a vital role in Building Better Ukraine.
